subject: Re: [PATCH v3 2/2] nfsdctl/rpc.nfsd: Add support for passing encrypted filehandle key

reviews.author: Benjamin Coddington (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Benjamin Coddington raised no specific technical concerns or objections to the patch, but instead acknowledged Jeff Layton's patches as helpful and accepted the soft error handling for missing filehandle key.

reviews.author: Chuck Lever
reviews.summary: Reviewer Chuck Lever pointed out that NFSv2 file handles do not have enough space to append a MAC, making the patch incompatible with this protocol version.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: The reviewer, Jeff Layton, pointed out that the patch needs to be rebased on top of his own patches for min-threads and suggested adding MIN_THREADS before the value in question. He also recommended throwing a hard error if the kernel doesn't support setting an fh_key for security reasons.
